title: Comparative Analysis of Productive Failure and Vicarious Failure Pedagogies in Mathematical Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Intermediate-level applied mathematics learning in science domains for office/management professionals

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain core principles of Productive Failure (PF) and Vicarious Failure (VF) pedagogies
Learners can analyze cognitive and emotional learning processes occurring in PF and VF contexts
Learners can conduct projects evaluating how learner characteristics (mathematical ability, prior knowledge, self-concept) influence PF/VF
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
